technologiesComp.brandMessage: A brand on the path of technological innovations
technologiesComp.description: We make the world softer by introducing innovations to create high-quality towels. Our fabrics provide comfort and durability with a focus on sustainability.

partnersCom.partnersTitle: We utilize advanced technologies and equipment from global brands to ensure the highest quality of our products

form.heading: Got questions?

footer.heading: We are always looking for new partnerships and opportunities

history.dcr1: More than just a business, it is a family heritage filled with warmth and care passed down through generations. It all started with Grandma Rafoat, whose skilled works became a symbol of quality and craftsmanship that inspire us today. Continuing the family tradition, her son expanded the family business by trading textile materials. In 2011, the grandchildren founded the company SamRafoatTekstil, named after their grandmother, and established ivy production, further expanding the family business.
history.dcr2: Starting with textile production, in 2014, the company created the PARISAHOME brand, emphasizing high-quality home products. With soft and comfortable towels, the company quickly gained the trust and attention of customers.
history.dcr3: From the very beginning, SamRafoatTekstil actively developed its export direction, allowing it to enter international markets. In 2021, we expanded our delivery geography by starting the export of terry towels to Japan. Today, our products are successfully supplied to over 15 countries, including the CIS countries, Japan, Hungary, Bulgaria, the USA, and Turkey. We continue to strive for excellence, inspired by the legacy of our grandmother Rafoat, bringing warmth and comfort to homes around the world.
history.dcr4: We take pride in our towel manufacturing experience, passed down through generations. Our team is focused on creating innovative solutions for your home that meet high standards while preserving the spirit of craftsmanship and dedication to family traditions.

sections.heading: Performance-Oriented
sections.description: We strive for maximum efficiency at every stage of our production, utilizing advanced technologies and optimizing processes. Our goal is to create products that meet the highest standards of quality and durability.

sections.heading: Customer-Centric
sections.description: Every solution we offer is based on our customers' needs. We listen closely to their feedback and strive to create products that provide comfort, convenience, and meet the demands of modern consumers.

sections.heading: Innovative
sections.description: We are constantly seeking new solutions and implementing innovations in our production processes. By using the latest developments in the textile industry, we create products that combine functionality with style.

exploreServices.tagline: Together, we make the world softer.
exploreServices.description: Since 2011, we have been accumulating experience and confirming our quality with international certificates that meet the high standards of the textile industry.

quote: We believe that softness is a luxury that should be brought into everyday life.
